title: Training/Custom Game Bots
body: I think it would be a good idea to add some sort of tool where you can tell the bot you are against what lane to be in, since they all go bot lane until you really push your lane. Its hard to practice top/mid if the bot is pushing a different lane. I don't know if this is possible but it would greatly help those practicing.

replies.body: While I believe training only lets you have 1 champ on each team, you can actually add a full team of bots when creating a custom game! Once you add in a full team of opposing bots, they will all pick individual lanes as if it were a real game.
